body:
Network360 Only

  • Compare Networks: Changed specialty group and volatility quadrants to use a standard average calculation instead of weighted average to make comparisons between small and large networks more accurate.
  • Compare Networks: Fixed bug that prevented the map tab from rendering on the provider detail pages for adds and drops in some cases.
  • Compare Networks: Changed volatility graph to show % like specialty mapping graph and round to 1 decimal place.
  • Create List: Fixed bug that causes the application to show an error whenever users included both a tag and a comparison network in the search criteria.
